table.create_sql:
CREATE TABLE `resblock_panorama` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `resblock_model_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小区模型ID',
  `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `raw_file_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '原始文件url',
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '缩略图URL',
  `coordinate` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景经纬度',
  `base_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件基础url',
  `cube_path` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分辨率全景目录',
  `right` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '右边全景文件名称',
  `left` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '左边全景文件名称',
  `up` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上方全景文件名称',
  `down` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '底部全景文件名称',
  `front` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '前方全景文件名称',
  `back` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '后方全景文件名称',
  `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否有效',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 未合成, 1: 已合成, 2: 合成中, 3: 合成失败)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='resblock_panorama'

CREATE TABLE `work_object` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'ObjectID,唯一主键,用发号器生成(而非自增)',
  `type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Object类型(1: Robot-扫地机器人, ...)',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理中, 2: 处理完成, 3: 处理失败, ...)',
  `input` mediumtext,
  `output` mediumtext COMMENT '出参: 算法工程的产物数据,一般后端无需理解',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id_type` (`work_id`,`type`),
  KEY `idx_status_create_time` (`status`,`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='Work物体(Object, 比如扫地机器人/柜子等)产物表,按照work_id%128分表'

CREATE TABLE `client` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `channel` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道',
  `platform` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平台(ios或android)',
  `package_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Package平台ID',
  `version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '版本(X.X.X格式)',
  `content` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '更新内容',
  `url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '更新地址',
  `content_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '版本内容介绍地址',
  `min_version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '000000000' COMMENT '最低版本号',
  `max_version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '999999999' COMMENT '最高版本号',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0:无效, 1:有效)',
  `is_grayscale` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否灰度',
  `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通1灰度',
  `create_user` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建用户',
  `modify_user` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改用户',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `config` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '配置列表',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_channel_platform_status` (`channel`,`platform`,`status`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='客户端版本表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_annotation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标注名称',
  `type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '类型 plane:2D box:3D',
  `labels` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签',
  `object_data` text COMMENT 'C端展示json',
  `algorithm_json` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '算法使用json',
  `keywords` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'json 扩展词数组',
  `space_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '空间ID',
  `derived_ids` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'derived_id数组',
  `extend` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `floorplan_space_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '应用户型图生成标注时用到的空间标识',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  `remove_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `idx_space_code` (`space_code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=31 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `custom_card_info` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '卡片数据(json格式)',
  `file_list` text COMMENT '文件列表(JSON)',
  `link_config` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '(JSON)VR空间信息-跳转链接',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=36 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='订制数据卡片信息表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_cold_data` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `feed_recommend` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否推荐到广场页feed',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='订制冷数据表'

CREATE TABLE `observer` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `visible_nodes` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '可见点列表(JSON: int array)',
  `accessible_nodes` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '可到点列表(JSON: int array)',
  `index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点编号',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '点位状态(0: 禁用, 1:启用)',
  `quaternion` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景点相对初始位置的旋转变换(JSON: x, y, z, w)',
  `standing_position` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '站立点三维坐标(JSON: int array)',
  `position` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景点三维坐标(JSON: int array)',
  `floor_index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '楼层',
  `offset_point_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '偏移点位数量',
  `device_info` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '点位设备信息',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_index` (`index`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5320 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='observer'

CREATE TABLE `movie` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `work_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'work的id',
  `matrix` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '矩阵',
  `size` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '尺寸',
  `index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '顺序',
  `url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '视频地址',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `derived_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work` (`work_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `navigation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '关联ID',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源',
  `house_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋编号',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源编号',
  `room_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房间名称',
  `audio_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '音频地址',
  `audio_duration` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `track_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '足迹地址',
  `track_data` mediumtext COMMENT '轨迹信息',
  `weight` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '权重',
  `tag` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '评分标签',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Navigation状态',
  `audit_status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '审核状态',
  `version` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '讲房版本',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_relation_id` (`relation_id`),
  KEY `idx_city_id_source_house_code` (`city_id`,`source`,`house_code`),
  KEY `idx_city_id_source_status_create_time` (`city_id`,`source`,`status`,`create_time`),
  KEY `idx_work_id_relation_id` (`work_id`,`relation_id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='navigation'

CREATE TABLE `third_tag_dict` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方标识',
  `third_tag_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '第三方标签id',
  `third_tag_content_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '第三方标签内容id',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除状态: 0未删除，1已删除',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_source_third_tag_id` (`source`,`third_tag_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='第三方标签表'

CREATE TABLE `cooperation_project_overlaps_info` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `sub_project_id1` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '子项目1ID',
  `project1_derived_ids` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '子项目1重叠点位数据（json）',
  `sub_project_id2` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '子项目2ID',
  `project2_derived_ids` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '子项目2重叠点位数据（json）',
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_sub_project_id1` (`sub_project_id1`),
  KEY `idx_sub_project_id2` (`sub_project_id2`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_timestamp`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=87 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='cooperation_project_merge_info'

CREATE TABLE `custom_contact` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'VR副本唯一ID',
  `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '昵称',
  `introduction` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '介绍',
  `avatar` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '头像',
  `mobile` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '电话',
  `email` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '邮箱',
  `city` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '城市',
  `occupation` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '职业',
  `contact_information` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系方式信息',
  `selection_custom` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '精选vr列表',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR联系人信息表'

CREATE TABLE `feedback_cameraman` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `order_no` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '订单编号(如视)',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋来源',
  `house_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋ID',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋Code',
  `feedback_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '反馈ID',
  `log_filename` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '日志文件名',
  `image_filename_list` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片文件名列表',
  `content` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '反馈内容',
  `is_reply` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否回复',
  `reply_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复用户ID',
  `reply_content` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '回复内容',
  `reply_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '回复时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_order_no` (`order_no`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='feedback_cameraman'

CREATE TABLE `guid_machine` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'MachineID, primary key, auto-increment',
  `area` char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default' COMMENT 'Area',
  `private_ip` char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '127.0.0.1' COMMENT 'Private IP-address',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Create Timestamp',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-01 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Modify Timestamp',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_area_private_ip` (`area`,`private_ip`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=141 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='GUID MachineID Mapping'

CREATE TABLE `live_group_session` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `original_session_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '原始的sessionID',
  `room_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'roomID',
  `voice_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '音频ID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会话状态',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_original_session_id` (`original_session_id`),
  KEY `idx_room_id` (`room_id`),
  KEY `idx_voice_id` (`voice_id`,`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr live group session'

CREATE TABLE `user_device` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `device_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最近一次登录用户ID',
  `channel` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '最近一次登录APP渠道',
  `version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '最近一次登录APP版本',
  `platform` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备平台,ios/android',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_device_id` (`device_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户设备表'

CREATE TABLE `work_archive_candidates` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `elect_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '入选时间戳',
  `archive_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '归档时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='项目归档候选表'

CREATE TABLE `square_tag_relation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `square_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '广场页资源ID',
  `tag_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '标签id',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '身份',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_square_id` (`square_id`),
  KEY `idx_tag_id` (`tag_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='square_tag_relation'

CREATE TABLE `vote_item` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `activity_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活动ID',
  `target_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '具体投票对象的ID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '活动状态，0 表示退出活动，1 表示参与活动',
  `score` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '得票数',
  `sequence` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '本次活动编号',
  `mark` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标记值，可用于标记投票结果',
  `extension` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '参与活动的信息（JSON格式）',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_target` (`target_id`,`activity_id`),
  KEY `idx_sequence` (`activity_id`,`sequence`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vote_item'

CREATE TABLE `work_addition` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `auto_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '自动户型图地址',
  `auto_standard_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '自动户型图标准截图',
  `model_screenshot_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型俯视图截图',
  `model_screenshot_ratio` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型俯视图截图比例尺',
  `bd_location` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '百度位置信息',
  `device_info` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备数据',
  `submitted_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '提交处理次数',
  `extrinsics` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '外参数据',
  `device_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `machine_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备ID',
  `machine_version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备版本',
  `area` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '总面积',
  `tile_level` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '瓦片层级',
  `cube_size` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'cube图尺寸',
  `observer_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '客户端所传点位数',
  `floor_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '客户端所传楼层数',
  `db_version` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `task_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务ID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=202 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='work_addition'

CREATE TABLE `authorization` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '被授权人ID',
  `authorizer_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '授权人ID',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `w_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `resource_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '资源类型 0实体vR 1未来家虚拟vR',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 0无效 1有效',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 1企业授权 2个人授权 0默认授权',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_work` (`user_id`,`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_work` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_wid_resource` (`w_id`,`resource_type`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=195 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='授权表'

CREATE TABLE `floorplan_raw` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `fid` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'fid',
  `floorplan` mediumtext COMMENT '户型图数据',
  `observer` text COMMENT '户型图数据',
  `initial` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '户型图数据',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_fid` (`fid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='floorplan_raw'

CREATE TABLE `live_open_session` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '会话ID',
  `original_session_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '基于哪个会话新生成的会话',
  `room_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'roomID',
  `voice_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '音频ID',
  `status` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会话状态 0:正常 1:关闭',
  `extension` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `app_id` bigint(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_original_session_id` (`original_session_id`),
  KEY `idx_room_id` (`room_id`),
  KEY `idx_voice_id` (`voice_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='会话信息ID'

CREATE TABLE `project_bind_info` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户所属业务方',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `entity_code` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体编码',
  `entity_name` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体名称',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_uid_source` (`user_id`,`source`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_ctime` (`create_timestamp`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='项目绑定信息'

CREATE TABLE `project_plane_area` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `project_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '项目名称',
  `project_area` decimal(10,4) unsigned DEFAULT '0.0000' COMMENT '项目的面积',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'VR-ID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态：0查询中,1成功,2失败',
  `run_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'runId',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR项目平面面积'

CREATE TABLE `work_task` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `data_source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '数据来源',
  `user_id` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户id',
  `task_id` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务ID',
  `parameters` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务参数',
  `count` smallint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务触发次数',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`,`data_source`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=248 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='work_task'

CREATE TABLE `commerce_navigation_chunk` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `commerce_navigation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导览id',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源',
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '片段名',
  `index` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '片段顺序',
  `audio_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '音频地址',
  `first_track_picture` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '第一帧图片地址',
  `audio_md5` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '校验和',
  `audio_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '音频类型。0上传音频，1同步录制，2预设音乐',
  `audio_duration` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '音频长度，单位是秒',
  `track_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '帧数据cdn地址',
  `waves` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '音轨',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_commerce_navigation_id` (`commerce_navigation_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='commerce_navigation_chunk'

CREATE TABLE `filter_task` (
  `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr副本id',
  `task_id` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务id',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理完成, 2: 处理中, 3: 处理失败）',
  `parameters` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务参数',
  `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型（1:整体滤镜触发，2:单点滤镜触发，3:单点滤镜撤销触发）',
  `apply_pano_index` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '触发滤镜任务的点位index',
  `remark` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `tag` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '来源',
  `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'normal' COMMENT 'Tag类型',
  `stick_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '附着方式',
  `dimension_type` varchar(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '2D' COMMENT '2D|3D标签',
  `name` varchar(192) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'Tag名称',
  `description` text COMMENT 'Tag描述',
  `position` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '三维坐标(JSON: int array)',
  `normal_vector` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '三维标签法向量',
  `target_url` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '媒体跳转地址',
  `typed_target_url` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分类型的跳转地址(JSON格式)',
  `media_data` text COMMENT '多媒体数据',
  `extra_data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展数据',
  `five_state` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'fiveState相关数据',
  `content_data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签扩展内容',
  `goods_code` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商品编码',
  `third_tag_dict_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '第三方标签id',
  `tag_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签分类ID,多个以英文逗号隔开',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Tag状态',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  `extend` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展信息',
  `keywords` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'json 扩展词数组',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id_work_type` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=888 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='tag'

CREATE TABLE `cluster` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '编号',
  `lang_name_map` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '语言名称字典',
  `default_region_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '默认的分区id',
  `picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片地址',
  `lang_picture_map` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片地址语言字典',
  `parent_cluster_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '父级cluster_id',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 1有效 0无效',
  `vr_unique` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '添加的VR是否唯一：0-不唯一，1-唯一',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方标识',
  `extension` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `creator_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建者ID',
  `default_child_cluster_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '默认的子分组ID',
  `cluster_index` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '子分组在父级分组中的顺序',
  `root_cluster_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '根节点标识',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_root_cluster_code` (`root_cluster_code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='集群'

CREATE TABLE `live` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Relation ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Work ID',
  `voice_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Voice ID',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型',
  `create_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建用户ID',
  `invited_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '邀请用户ID',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_relation_id_create_user_id` (`relation_id`,`create_user_id`),
  KEY `idx_relation_id_invited_user_id` (`relation_id`,`invited_user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='live'

CREATE TABLE `media` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `key` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标识(original_url的MD5)',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '类型(1: 视频)',
  `original_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '原始地址',
  `processed_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '处理地址',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 处理中, 1: 完成, 2: 失败)',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_key` (`key`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='media'

CREATE TABLE `work_cleanup_history` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `task_id` varchar(64) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '算法工程的TaskID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='Work清理历史记录表(流水)，可能存在多次清理的情形(但正常不应出现)'

CREATE TABLE `work_object_task` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'ObjectID,唯一主键,用发号器生成(而非自增)',
  `type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Object类型(1: Robot-扫地机器人, ...)',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态, 具体取值与work_object一致',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_type_status` (`type`,`status`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='Work物体任务表, 方便翻页扫描查看进度'

CREATE TABLE `vr_navigation_record` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `vr_navigation_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr_navigation id',
  `user_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `action` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '操作',
  `content` mediumtext COMMENT '内容',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_vr_navigation_id` (`vr_navigation_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=62 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr_navigation_record'

CREATE TABLE `sand_table_item` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `sand_table_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '沙盘ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'VR_ID',
  `is_model_shown` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否默认展示',
  `transform` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '4x4的转换矩阵',
  `viewer_volume` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'VR可见范围',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_sand_id` (`sand_table_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=110 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='沙盘中的项目列表'

CREATE TABLE `universal_authorization` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `from_source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '发起业务方标识',
  `to_source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '接收业务方标识',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态: 0无效 1有效',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_to_source` (`to_source`),
  KEY `idx_from_source` (`from_source`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='通用授权表'

CREATE TABLE `vr_navigation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `customer_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商业化顾客ID',
  `object` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '导览对象',
  `object_type` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '对象类型：reality、virtual',
  `content` mediumtext COMMENT '结果',
  `stash_content` mediumtext COMMENT '暂存内容',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `idx_object` (`object`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=34 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr_navigation'

CREATE TABLE `album` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `template_id` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '模板id',
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `title_picture_url` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图',
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `description` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `author_switch` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '作者信息开关',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='相册表'

CREATE TABLE `cooperation_project` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `source` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `db_version` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '数据版本',
  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '4' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄,3云台,4伽罗华,5黎曼)',
  `sub_project_list` varchar(2048) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '子项目信息列表',
  `original_gather_project_id_list` varchar(2048) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '包含的原始采集项目ID列表',
  `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1默认,2处理中,3处理失败,4处理成功',
  `shepherd_task_id` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '牧羊人任务ID',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已删除（0: 未删除，1: 已删除）',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_source` (`source`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_create_timestamp` (`create_timestamp`),
  KEY `idx_user_id_create_timestamp` (`user_id`,`create_timestamp`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=114 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='cooperation_project'

CREATE TABLE `device` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `name` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备名称',
  `platform` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平台',
  `keyword` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关键字',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_platform` (`platform`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='device'

CREATE TABLE `nps_feedback` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `uuid` varchar(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户uuid',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `relation_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房源关联id',
  `scene` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '场景',
  `event` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '事件',
  `user_agent` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'user_agent',
  `module` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '视说场景模块',
  `evaluate` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '评分 1\\2\\3\\4\\5',
  `tag` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签 多个标签 id,隔开 1-1,2-1,3-1',
  `request_platform` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '请求平台',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '来源',
  `decoration_plan_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '未来家 plan_id',
  `comment` varchar(512) NOT NULL COMMENT '评论内容',
  `is_close` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否关闭 0默认 1关闭',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_uuid_relation_id` (`uuid`,`relation_id`),
  KEY `idx_userid_relation_id` (`user_id`,`relation_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='nps用户看房满意度评价表'

CREATE TABLE `project_square_relation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'clone work_id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `square_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '广场资源id',
  `org_work_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '原始 work_id',
  `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 0默认 1合集',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='project_square_relation'

CREATE TABLE `template_content` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `template_key` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模板ID',
  `content` mediumtext COMMENT '模板内容json',
  `create_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id_template_key` (`custom_id`,`template_key`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=25 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='模板内容'

CREATE TABLE `user_config` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户ID，空表示所有用户',
  `gather` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '采集参数相关配置，json格式',
  `pan_tilt` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '云台相关配置，json格式',
  `more` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '更多配置，json格式',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='user_config'

CREATE TABLE `custom_panorama_extension` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制ID',
  `panorama_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景ID',
  `derived_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导入ID',
  `algorithm_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '算法类型',
  `index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点值',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通,1白模',
  `up` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上方全景文件名称',
  `down` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '底部全景文件名称',
  `left` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT '左边全景文件名称',
  `right` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT '右边全景文件名称',
  `front` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '前方全景文件名称',
  `back` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '后方全景文件名称',
  `checksums` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件校验和(JSON: string object)',
  `depth` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '深度文件名称',
  `mark` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '马赛克辅助标记',
  `task_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务id',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  `remove_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`),
  KEY `idx_panorama_id` (`panorama_id`),
  KEY `idx_index` (`index`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='custom_panorama_extension'

CREATE TABLE `live_record` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
  `create_user_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '创建带看的用户ID',
  `host_user_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '带看的主持人ID',
  `create_entrance` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '带看发起的入口， PC_CONSOLE pc-console后台发起 app发起 OTHER其他',
  `room_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '带看房间编码',
  `resource_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源编码',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务source',
  `app_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务app_code',
  `extension` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '扩展信息, JSON序列化后字符串',
  `create_timestamp` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_timestamp` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_room_code` (`room_code`),
  KEY `idx_create_user_id` (`create_user_id`),
  KEY `idx_host_user_id` (`host_user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='带看记录表'

CREATE TABLE `pano_video` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr副本id',
  `pano_index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点id',
  `video_list` varchar(3072) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'JSON视频信息列表',
  `derived_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导入id',
  `derived_id_str` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '导入ID字符串',
  `render_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '前端用于渲染的id',
  `guide_config` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'JSON点位视频引导配置',
  `handle_response` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'JSON算法处理状态',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理完成, 2: 处理中, 3: 处理失败)',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=21 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `project_floor` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `name` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼层名称',
  `position` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '楼层编号',
  `height` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼层高度',
  `delete_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间戳',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='项目楼层'

CREATE TABLE `pts_list` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `file_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'PTS文件名',
  `machine_no` varchar(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备序列号',
  `last_admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上次修改人',
  `admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '下载人ID',
  `last_modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '上次修改时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `modify_time` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_machine_no` (`machine_no`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='PTS上传表'

CREATE TABLE `cube_task_extension` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '副本id',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'workId',
  `panorama_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '点位id',
  `derived_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导入id',
  `task_id` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务id',
  `front` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '前方全景文件名称',
  `back` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '后方全景文件名称',
  `down` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '下方全景文件名称',
  `up` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上方全景文件名称',
  `left` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '左方全景文件名称',
  `right` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '右方全景文件名称',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `idx_panorama_id` (`panorama_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `navigation_tts_train` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `agent_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '经纪人ID',
  `sex` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '经纪人性别 0-女；1-男',
  `voice` varchar(8291) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '录入的阅读文本片段，语音资源的JSON',
  `voice_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 0 草稿; 1 完成; 2 音色训练成功; 3 音色训练失败',
  `reason` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '音色训练失败原因',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `is_authorize` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 0 未授权，1 已授权',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_agent` (`agent_id`),
  KEY `idx_voice_name` (`voice_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='音色训练详情'

CREATE TABLE `resblock_tag` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `resblock_model_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小区模型ID',
  `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'normal' COMMENT 'Tag类型(normal/building)',
  `sub_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Tag子类型',
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'Tag名称',
  `description` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'Tag描述',
  `coordinate` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '三维坐标(JSON: int array)',
  `target_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '媒体跳转地址',
  `media_data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '多媒体数据',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Tag状态',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id_work_type` (`resblock_model_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='resblock_tag'

CREATE TABLE `cluster_region_item` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `region_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分区ID',
  `region_index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分区子项在分区中的排序号',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'custom id',
  `custom_package_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'package id',
  `description` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_region` (`region_id`,`region_index`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='集群分区的子项'

CREATE TABLE `custom_floor_initial` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'custom id',
  `floor_index` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼层索引',
  `initial` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '初始视角（JSON）',
  `picture_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '截图url',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `lidar` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '系统号',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `json_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '户型图地址',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目id',
  `outline_floor_plan` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '框线户型图',
  `hierarchy_floor_plan` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分层户型图',
  `standard_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图地址',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_source` (`user_id`,`source`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `vr_object` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'ObjectID,唯一主键,用发号器生成(而非自增)',
  `vr_code` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT 'VR编码',
  `type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Object类型(1: Robot-扫地机器人, ...)',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理中, 2: 处理完成, 3: 处理失败, ...)',
  `input` mediumtext,
  `output` mediumtext COMMENT '出参: 算法工程的产物数据,一般后端无需理解',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_vr_code_type` (`vr_code`,`type`),
  KEY `idx_status_create_time` (`status`,`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='通用VR产物表，利用vr_code转CRC32，然后128取余分表'

CREATE TABLE `resblock_model` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `resblock_area_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '区域模型ID',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'LINK' COMMENT '来源',
  `resblock_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小区ID',
  `business_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '业务方ID',
  `coordinates` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '区域坐标',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `panorama_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景摄影师ID',
  `bizcircle_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商圈ID',
  `file_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型文件地址',
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '缩略图URL',
  `audit_status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '审核状态(0:审核拒绝, 1:审核通过)',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 未合成, 1: 已合成, 2: 合成中, 3: 合成失败)',
  `finish_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '完成时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_area_model_id` (`resblock_area_id`),
  KEY `idx_resblock_id` (`resblock_id`),
  KEY `idx_city_id_district_id` (`city_id`,`bizcircle_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='resblock_model'

CREATE TABLE `task` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务类型',
  `input` text COMMENT '输入参数',
  `keyfield_value` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '输入参数关键字段值',
  `output` text COMMENT '任务输出',
  `state` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '状态：0等待执行 1进行中 3等待回调 5已完成',
  `progress` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '处理的进度',
  `server_ip` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '接收任务的server_ip',
  `weight` int(4) unsigned DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '权重，越小越优先',
  `plan_at` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '计划执行时间',
  `expire_at` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '过期时间',
  `creator` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_type_state_server_ip` (`type`,`state`,`server_ip`),
  KEY `idx_type_keyfield_value` (`type`,`keyfield_value`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='task'

CREATE TABLE `custom` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `authorization_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '授权id',
  `lang` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '语言',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `initial` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '初始点位信息(JSON: initial_pano, initial_heading, initial_longitude, initial_latitude)',
  `picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '封面图地址',
  `title_picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图地址',
  `upload_title_picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上传标题图地址',
  `panorama_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '微博全景图地址',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `introduction` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '空间介绍',
  `bd_location` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '百度位置信息',
  `process_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '流程ID',
  `editor_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '编辑平台枚举值',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '项目上下线状态: 0下线 1上线',
  `is_bound` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否绑定: 0未绑定 1已绑定',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已删除: 0未删除 1已删除',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 1有效 0无效',
  `is_ai_design` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否跑过 AI 设计',
  `media_data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '多媒体数据',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  `active_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活跃空间到期时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_custom_id` (`custom_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`,`authorization_id`),
  KEY `work_id` (`work_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=196 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='定制数据主表'

CREATE TABLE `live_group_room` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `user_type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户类型（1:用户，2:经纪人，3:置业顾问）',
  `user_platform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户平台',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'room类型',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房间状态',
  `extension` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr live group room'

CREATE TABLE `navigation_agent_appearance` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `agent_id` bigint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '经纪人ID',
  `agent_code` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '经纪人code',
  `agent_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纪人姓名',
  `agent_shop` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纪人门店',
  `agent_title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纪人职位',
  `agent_cover` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纪人头像',
  `appearance_point` varchar(9216) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纪人形象(JSON格式)',
  `photographer_id` bigint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '摄影师ID',
  `photographer_code` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '摄影师code',
  `photographer_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '摄影师姓名',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '3' COMMENT '状态：3 摄影师已提交；1 摄影师已撤回; 2 经纪人已驳回; 5 经纪人已确认;',
  `reason` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '驳回原因',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `point_version` smallint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '256' COMMENT '经纪人形象版本',
  `is_authorize` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态: 0 未授权，1 已授权',
  `extension` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `train_status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '形象训练状态',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_agent` (`agent_id`),
  KEY `idx_photographer` (`photographer_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='navigation_agent_appearance'

CREATE TABLE `navigation_media_train` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `train_key` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT '唯一参数',
  `agent_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '经纪人ID',
  `user_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `customer_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '商业化顾客ID',
  `voice_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '音色名字',
  `result` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '训练结果',
  `train_status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '训练状态',
  `train_type` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '类型：video、audio',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_train_key` (`train_key`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='navigation_media_train'

CREATE TABLE `project_pano_list` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `name` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景图名称',
  `floor_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点所在楼层id',
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '缩略图图片链接',
  `derived_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景点唯一ID',
  `width` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '宽度px',
  `height` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '高度px',
  `delete_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间戳',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`,`floor_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='全景图列表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_contact_template` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `source` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '租户标识',
  `template_data` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模板信息',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改事件戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `model` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `file_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型文件地址',
  `file_url_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型文件校验和',
  `material_base_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型材质目录',
  `material_textures` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型材质文件列表(JSON: string array)',
  `material_textures_checksums` varchar(8192) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型材质文件列表校验和(JSON: string array)',
  `virtual_wall_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型补墙文件地址',
  `virtual_wall_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型补墙文件校验和',
  `score` double unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '模型评分',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通,1白模',
  `tiles` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型瓦片相关数据(主要支持大空间场景)',
  `layers` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '[]' COMMENT '新的模型数据规则存储',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=274 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='model'

CREATE TABLE `operate_log` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `project_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'work_id',
  `user_identifier` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户标识',
  `app_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'app_id',
  `source` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'source',
  `primary_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '主键id',
  `table` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '操作的表',
  `operate_type` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '操作类型',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展信息',
  `trace_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关联一次操作的多条log',
  `is_user_visible` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户是否可见 0 - 不可见 1 - 可见',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_identifier` (`user_identifier`),
  KEY `idx_trace_id` (`trace_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_app_id` (`app_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='操作日志表'

CREATE TABLE `project` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型(1: dimension, 2: vision)',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `org_work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'clone的父workdId',
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `remark` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `sub_status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '子状态',
  `is_uploaded` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0默认。是否上传',
  `is_ai_design` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '默认0 是否存在ai设计装修',
  `lidar` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr拍摄是否使用了lidar技术',
  `is_align` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr拍摄是否使用位姿拼接',
  `align_times` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '999' COMMENT '位姿次数N值',
  `offline_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '本地项目id',
  `city_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时的城市ID',
  `estimate_finish` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目预计完成时间',
  `is_shoot_16k` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否是16k拍摄',
  `feed_switch` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'feed开关',
  `feed_recommend` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否推荐到广场页feed',
  `source` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `introduction` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '空间介绍',
  `title_picture_url` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图地址',
  `bd_location` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '百度位置信息',
  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄)',
  `shoot_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '拍摄类型。1是ar拍摄，2是拼接定位，0是未知',
  `is_nomodel_shoot` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 默认不存在 1存在无模型拍摄点位',
  `process_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '流程ID',
  `submitted_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '提交处理次数',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已删除（0: 未删除, 1: 已删除）',
  `extrinsics` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '外参数据',
  `floor_map` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼层映射',
  `extension` varchar(2048) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `confirm_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '确认时间',
  `expire_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '过期时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_time`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id_create_time` (`user_id`,`create_time`),
  KEY `idx_user_id_modify_time` (`user_id`,`modify_time`),
  KEY `idx_source_type_device` (`source`,`type`,`device_type`),
  KEY `idx_offline_id` (`offline_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=240 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='project'

CREATE TABLE `user_event` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ucid',
  `event` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '事件类型',
  `context` text COMMENT '事件上下文',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_event` (`user_id`,`event`,`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户相关事件表'

CREATE TABLE `poincare_project` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID，来自设备',
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `product_url` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产物url',
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目缩略图地址',
  `info_url` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'info文件url',
  `status` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目状态',
  `create_timestamp` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`,`status`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=48 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='庞加莱项目'

CREATE TABLE `ruler` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '定制id',
  `polyline` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标尺折线信息(JSON格式)',
  `keywords` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'json 扩展词数组',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `custom_attribute` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方标识',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'customId',
  `package_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr包id',
  `key` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '功能标识，如：packageTour-跟团游',
  `value` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '该功能关联的具体数据值，如：cluster_id',
  `creator_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建者id',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR项目属性扩展表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_floor_plan` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `hierarchy_floor_plan` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分层户型图',
  `outline_floor_plan` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '框线户型图',
  `standard_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图地址',
  `storage_standard_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图地址(转存楼盘字典)',
  `json_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '户型图地址',
  `format_model_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '格式化模型插件数据',
  `format_compass_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '格式化指南针尺插件数据',
  `format_ruler_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '格式化全景标尺插件数据',
  `format_floorplan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '格式化户型图插件数据',
  `floor_plan_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '户型图来源(3:cyclops用户编辑,2:自动户型图,1:cyclops端用户自主上传,0:admin端摄影师编辑)',
  `is_confirm` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未确认 1已确认',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=21 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='订制数据户型图表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_panorama` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制ID',
  `count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点数量',
  `base_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件根目录',
  `cube_path` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件子目录',
  `argument` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '参数(JSON: lat_top, lat_down, high_quality, low_quality, overlay:name, overlay:opacity)',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通,1白模',

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='custom_panorama'

CREATE TABLE `human_operation` (

CREATE TABLE `navigation_audit_log` (

CREATE TABLE `user_invitation` (

  `risk_type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '风控的风险类型',

CREATE TABLE `custom_example` (

CREATE TABLE `floor` (

  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',

CREATE TABLE `live_open_user` (

CREATE TABLE `custom_model` (

  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',

CREATE TABLE `tag_old` (

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',

  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
