  `bizcircle_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商圈名称(楼盘字典)',
  `resblock_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '楼盘ID(楼盘字典)',
  `resblock_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼盘名称(楼盘字典)',
  `house_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房源ID(楼盘字典)',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源编码(下单使用)',
  `target_city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '890000' COMMENT '城市ID(业务方)',
  `target_resblock_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '楼盘编码(业务方)',
  `target_resblock_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '楼盘名称(业务方)',
  `target_house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房源编码(业务方)',
  `target_house_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源名称(业务方)',
  `contact_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系人名称',
  `contact_number` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系人电话',
  `longitude` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源经度',
  `latitude` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源纬度',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_source` (`source`),
  KEY `idx_source_house_code` (`source`,`house_code`),
  KEY `idx_source_target_house_code` (`source`,`target_house_code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='House'

CREATE TABLE `nerf_model` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `picture_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型截图',
  `model_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '模型url',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态：0-未提交  1-处理中 2-处理成功 3-处理失败',
  `task_id` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务提交id',
  `is_example` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否是示例项目',
  `create_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建者id',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '租户标识',
  `filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上传文件名',
  `submit_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务提交时间',
  `process_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '处理完成时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建完成时间',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间',
  `remove_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `resblock_manuscript` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `writer_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `auditor_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `resblock_id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,

  `simple_manuscript` text,
  `state` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `sand_table` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方标识',
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '沙盘名称',
  `initial` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '初始视角信息',
  `link_code` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '短链接编码',
  `master_custom_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '主VR的ID',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活跃状态: 0非活跃，1活跃',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  `remove_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间戳',

) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=66 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='多VR组合展示沙盘'

CREATE TABLE `floor_plan_dict` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '户型图来源类型',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '配合type使用的对象的对象id',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_source` (`user_id`,`source`),
  KEY `idx_custom_type` (`custom_id`,`type`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `navigation_statistic` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'workID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '关联ID',
  `navigation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '讲房ID',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源',
  `date` date NOT NULL COMMENT '日期',
  `average_duration` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '平均时长(单位: 秒)',
  `complete_rate` double unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '完成比率(保留小数点后四位)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_date` (`date`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='navigation_statistic'

CREATE TABLE `push_task` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(150) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '消息标题',
  `content` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '消息内容json',
  `public_id` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SYSTEM' COMMENT '消息公众号',
  `push_rules` text COMMENT '发送用户',
  `android_push_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '腾讯推送的id',
  `ios_push_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '腾讯推送的id',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未执行  1执行中  2执行完成 3暂停执行 4执行失败',
  `op_user` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '操作人',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `website_customer` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',

CREATE TABLE `_floor_plan_ghc` (

CREATE TABLE `live_channel` (

  `user_platform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '用户平台',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `extension` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',

CREATE TABLE `work` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `is_open` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否开放平台采集的数据 0 - 否 1 - 是',
  `project_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '-' COMMENT '项目ID(iPad生成)',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '项目状态',
  `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目标题',
  `description` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目描述',
  `picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景图地址',
  `picture_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景图校验和',
  `initial` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '初始信息(JSON: initial_pano, initial_heading, initial_longitude, initial_latitude)',
  `machine_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备ID',
  `machine_version` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备版本',
  `bind_code` varchar(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '快速绑定编码',
  `is_bound` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否绑定 (0: 未绑定, 1: 已绑定)',
  `title_picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图地址',
  `title_picture_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图校验和',
  `upload_title_picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上传标题图地址',
  `upload_title_picture_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上传标题图校验和',
  `house_layout` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '居室信息',
  `standard_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图地址',
  `standard_floor_plan_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图校验和',
  `storage_standard_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标准户型图地址(转存楼盘字典)',
  `hierarchy_floor_plan` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分层户型图',
  `outline_floor_plan` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '框线户型图',
  `auto_floor_plan_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '自动户型图地址',
  `auto_floor_plan_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '自动户型图校验和',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理完成, 2: 模型处理中, 3: 模型处理失败, 4: 重传处理中, 5: 重传处理失败)',
  `floor_plan_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '户型图来源(2:自动户型图,1:cyclops端用户自主上传,0:admin端摄影师编辑)',
  `editor_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '编辑平台枚举值',
  `panorama_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '微博全景图地址',
  `from_type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'vr' COMMENT '数据来源 vr:实景vr weilaijia:未来家',
  `latest_complete_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '最新的处理完成时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `user_identifier` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户标识',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  `is_ai_design` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否跑过 AI 设计',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_time`),
  KEY `idx_user_id_create_time` (`user_id`,`create_time`),
  KEY `idx_user_identifier` (`user_identifier`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=172 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='work'

CREATE TABLE `bind_code` (

  `bind_code` varchar(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '绑定编码',

  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

  KEY `idx_user_id_bind_code` (`user_id`,`bind_code`),
  KEY `idx_user_id_bind_code_id` (`user_id`,`bind_code`,`id`)

CREATE TABLE `custom_model_clip` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',

  `cuttable` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '裁剪是否生效：0不生效，1生效',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',

CREATE TABLE `work_flat_map_tip` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `flat_map_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '平面图片id',

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_flat_map` (`flat_map_id`,`lang`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR平面图片标识说明'

CREATE TABLE `work_recommend_relation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '主work_id',

  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_work_id_recommend_work_id` (`work_id`,`recommend_work_id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`,`recommend_custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='work_recommend_relation'

CREATE TABLE `project_entity_info` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄)',
  `project_status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0默认,1处理成功',
  `bind_code` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户绑定时输入编码',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `entity_id` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体ID',
  `entity_code` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体编码',
  `entity_name` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体名称',
  `entity_summary` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体介绍',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态(1-有效，0-无效)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),

CREATE TABLE `project_tag_relation` (

CREATE TABLE `user` (

  `profession` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '职业',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `floor_plan` (

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `live_open_entity` (

  `room_id` bigint(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房间ID',
  `tag` varchar(16) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体类型标签: recording/...',
  `data` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '序列化数据，具体内容取决于具体tag',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_room_id` (`room_id`),
  KEY `idx_create_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='开放平台带看实体'

CREATE TABLE `open_project` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `user_identifier` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户标识',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `task_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '算法pipeline的任务id',
  `shoot_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '拍摄类型。1是ar拍摄，2是拼接定位，0是未知',
  `is_no_model_shoot` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 默认 1存在无模型拍摄点位',
  `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `remark` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `status` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0-默认 1-项目上传失败 2-项目上传成功 3-数据处理中 4-数据处理成功 5-数据处理失败 6-放入回收站 7-永久删除 8-项目上传中 9-数据被导出 10-数据正在导出中 11-数据处理任务已取消 12-数据导出失败',
  `device_type` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄，3云台，4专业相机（伽罗华)',
  `machine_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备ID',
  `upload_panorama_url` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'cos全景图地址',
  `upload_panorama_checksum` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景图地址校验和(文件md5)',
  `source_panorama_url` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '原始全景图地址',
  `app_version` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'app版本',
  `hardware_version` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '硬件版本',
  `run_benchmark` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '使用什么算法 信任用户/自动拼接/部分优化',
  `description` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'SDK传入的描述',
  `is_manual_align` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否手动对齐 0 - 否 1 - 是',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方',
  `app_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '开放平台的app_id',
  `introduction` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '空间介绍',
  `extension` varchar(2048) DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `move_trash_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '放入回收站时间',
  `delete_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '彻底删除时间',
  `shoot_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '拍摄时间',
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `offline_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '本地项目id',
  `db_version` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目版本',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_identifier` (`user_identifier`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_app_id` (`app_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='开放平台项目信息表'

CREATE TABLE `poincare_project_task` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `project_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `task_id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务ID',
  `db_version` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '数据版本',
  `product_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产物url',
  `status` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务处理状态',
  `create_timestamp` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`,`status`),
  KEY `idx_task` (`task_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=65 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='项目任务历史'

CREATE TABLE `project_attachment` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `attachment_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源名字',
  `resource` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源地址',
  `resource_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源类型：image 图片、video 视频、audio 音频',
  `category` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '资源分类',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已删除: 0未删除 1已删除',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_attachment_id` (`attachment_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='project_attachment'

CREATE TABLE `entity_info` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '绑定关系ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `bind_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '绑定码',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `entity_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体编码',
  `entity_name` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体名称',
  `entity_summary` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体介绍',
  `entity_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '实体ID',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态(1-有效，0-无效)',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

  KEY `idx_entity_code_source` (`entity_code`,`source`)

CREATE TABLE `navigation_talkpoint_item` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `talkpoint_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '讲点编号',
  `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '讲点中文名称',
  `field` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '讲点英文名称',
  `value` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '讲点内容',
  `description` varchar(2028) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

CREATE TABLE `project_pose_task` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `db_version` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '数据版本',
  `status` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务状态',

CREATE TABLE `work_count` (

CREATE TABLE `ai_navigation` (

CREATE TABLE `cluster_region` (

  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',

CREATE TABLE `work_index_v1` (

  `picture_url` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图地址',
  `user_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `project_auto_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'project表自增id',
  `project_name` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `offline_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '本地项目id',
  `work_title` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'work标题',
  `project_status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'project状态',
  `deal_status` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '处理状态',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',

  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄,3云台,4伽罗华 5黎曼)',
  `app_version` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'app版本',
  `phone_os` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '手机操作系统',
  `device_model` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备型号',
  `device_uid` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备用户UID',
  `is_gimbal` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否使用平衡架',
  `is_deleted` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已删除 0-未删除 1-已删除',
  `shoot_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '拍摄时间',

  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `group_node` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '来源',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '结点名称',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否上线：0-未上线，1-已上线',
  `is_default` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否B端默认item结点：0-否，1-是',
  `is_show` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否C端优先展示item结点：0-否，1-是',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结点类型：0-group，1-item',
  `level` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结点所在层，根节点为0，子结点=父结点层+1',
  `position` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '同层结点的相对位置',
  `code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '结点存储的键值',
  `code_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结点上存储的键值的类型：0-未知，1-实体VR',
  `path` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '结点路径',
  `creator_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建者ID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modifier_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改者ID',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_path` (`path`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='组管理表'

CREATE TABLE `strategy` (
  `id` bigint(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `website_position` (

CREATE TABLE `audit_record` (

CREATE TABLE `cube_task` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr副本id',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkId',
  `task_id` varchar(48) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务id',
  `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态(0: 默认, 1: 处理完成, 2: 处理中, 3: 处理失败)',
  `remark` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `parameters` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务参数',
  `base_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件子目录',
  `cube_path` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件根目录',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `custom_mosaic` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=81 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='custom_mosaic'

CREATE TABLE `dict_white_list` (

CREATE TABLE `work_flat_map` (

CREATE TABLE `video` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '视频类型',
  `video_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '生成视频链接',
  `video_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '视频校验和',
  `video_duration` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '视频时长(单位: 毫秒)',
  `picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '第一帧图片',
  `picture_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '第一帧图片校验和',
  `side_map_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '户型图',
  `side_map_checksum` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '户型图校验和',
  `version` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '视频版本',

  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',

CREATE TABLE `work_index` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'work_id',
  `title_picture_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题图地址',

  `project_auto_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'project表自增id',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目名称',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `source` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `source_tag` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'source标签',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'work_house_relation_id',
  `register_channel` tinyint(2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'source注册来源',

  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `house_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋编号',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源编号',
  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '设备类型(1:手机拍摄,2:全景相机拍摄,3云台,4伽罗华,5黎曼)',
  `app_version` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'app版本',
  `phone_os` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '手机操作系统',
  `device_model` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备型号',
  `device_uid` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备用户UID',
  `is_gimbal` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否使用平衡架',
  `gps` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '经纬度',
  `observer_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '点位数量',
  `floor_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '楼层数量',
  `floor_scan_size` float unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '户型图扫描面积',
  `auto_floor_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '自动户型图楼层数量',
  `auto_floor_scan_size` float unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '自动户型图扫描面积',
  `resource_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'resource_code',
  `weight` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '展示权重',
  `work_title` text COMMENT 'VR标题',
  `description` text COMMENT '描述',
  `hidden` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否隐藏',
  `industry` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '行业',
  `short_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'ShortCode',
  `date` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '日期',
  `work_create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT 'work创建时间',
  `work_modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT 'work更新时间',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),

CREATE TABLE `work_task_cost` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',

  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',

  `device_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '设备类型',
  `pod_name` varchar(64) DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'pod_name',
  `hostname` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'hostname',
  `cost` float DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '耗时',
  `derive_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '点位ID',
  `observer_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '点位数量',
  `date` varchar(16) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '日期',
  `start_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '开始时间',

CREATE TABLE `custom_package` (

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `custom_task_record` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',

  `sub_type` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务子类型',
  `parameters` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务参数json',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '修改时间戳',

CREATE TABLE `plane` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',

  `visible_nodes_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '可见点计数',
  `size` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '平面可放置最大立方体边长(毫米)',
  `height` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '平面距离地板高度,可能为负数(毫米)',
  `object_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平面所属物体的推测类型',
  `cell_type` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间小类型',
  `room_type` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间类型',
  `room_name` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分间名称',
  `room_area` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间面积(平方毫米)',
  `floor_index` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间所在楼层(从0开始)',
  `version` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '算法版本',
  `extra` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展信息(JSON)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'create time',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`,`size`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr plane'

CREATE TABLE `square_material` (

  `author` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '作者昵称',
  `author_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '作者id',
  `author_img` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '作者头像',
  `score` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '列表排序值',
  `recommend_score` int(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '推荐位顺序，0非推荐位',
  `base_likes` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '运营设置的点赞数',
  `tags` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签列表，json格式',
  `click_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '资源点击次数',
  `collection` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '集合信息',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr对应的WorkID',
  `creator_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建者id',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',

  `modifior_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '编辑者user_id',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_type_score` (`type`,`score`),

) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='square_material'

CREATE TABLE `tree_node` (

CREATE TABLE `live_group_house` (

  `data` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `config` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '速览配置(JSON String)',
  `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '来源类型，0-普通类型 1-旧自动导览点 2-新自动导览点 3-客户主动触发的自动导览点',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id_pano_index` (`work_id`,`pano_index`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id_display_index` (`custom_id`,`display_index`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=115 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='存储如视vr点位截图信息'

CREATE TABLE `order_form` (
  `order_no` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '订单编号(如视)',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型(1: rushi, 2: saas)',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `project_id` varchar(64) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '-' COMMENT '项目ID(iPad生成)',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `source` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '来源',
  `house_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋编号',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源编号',
  `reason` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '放弃原因',
  `status` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `audit_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '审核类型(1: 机审, 2: 人审, 3:不审)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`order_no`),

  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_city_id_source` (`city_id`,`source`),

CREATE TABLE `object_position` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '有效状态',
  `data` text COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`) USING BTREE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `panorama` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点数量',
  `base_url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件根目录',
  `cube_path` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件子目录',
  `argument` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '参数(JSON: lat_top, lat_down, high_quality, low_quality, overlay:name, overlay:opacity)',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通,1白模',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=230 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='panorama'

CREATE TABLE `panorama_extension` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `panorama_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景ID',
  `derived_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导入ID',
  `derived_id_str` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '导入ID字符串',
  `algorithm_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '算法类型',
  `index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点值',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通,1白模',
  `up` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '上方全景文件名称',
  `down` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '底部全景文件名称',
  `depth` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '深度文件名称',
  `left` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT '左边全景文件名称',
  `right` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT '右边全景文件名称',
  `front` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '前方全景文件名称',
  `back` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '后方全景文件名称',
  `checksums` varchar(512) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '全景文件校验和(JSON: string object)',
  `mark` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '马赛克辅助标记',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_panorama_id` (`panorama_id`),
  KEY `idx_index` (`index`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5320 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='panorama_extension'

CREATE TABLE `vr_link_config` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增id',

  `create_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',

  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`),
  KEY `idx_derived_id` (`derived_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='展示端配置'

CREATE TABLE `space_show_relation` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `vr_code` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'vr code',
  `vr_custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr code 的定制ID',
  `render_code` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '虚拟VR code',
  `style_id` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '虚拟VR的风格ID',
  `render_custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '虚拟 code 的定制ID',
  `vr_resource_code` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'vr资源code',
  `render_resource_code` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'render资源code',
  `create_user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建人ID',
  `create_source` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '创建的source',
  `is_active` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '记录是否活跃 : 0 - 不活跃 1 - 活跃',
  `status` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否在同屏对比中展示，0-不展示，1-展示',
  `extension` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '扩展信息',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

  KEY `idx_resource_code` (`vr_resource_code`),
  KEY `idx_vr_resource_code_style_id` (`vr_resource_code`,`style_id`)

CREATE TABLE `work_basis` (

CREATE TABLE `auto_room_picture` (

CREATE TABLE `live_evaluation` (

  `label_content` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标签内容，英文逗号分隔',
  `input_content` varchar(90) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文本框输入内容',

  `extension` text COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '录入时间',
  `modify_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

CREATE TABLE `resblock_cameraman` (

CREATE TABLE `room_picture` (

  `cell_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分间名称',
  `cell_type` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间类型',
  `cell_name_type` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分间功能间类型',
  `url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '地址',
  `width` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '图片宽',
  `height` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '图片高',

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),

  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),

CREATE TABLE `custom_seeder` (

CREATE TABLE `resblock_area` (

  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_resource_code` (`custom_id`,`source`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='背景音乐表'

CREATE TABLE `work_archive` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `archive_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '归档时间戳',
  `extract_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '提档时间戳',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='项目归档记录表'

CREATE TABLE `custom_panorama_filter` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `pano_index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '全景点编号',
  `derived_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '导入Id',
  `data` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '滤镜数据(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='点位维度滤镜数据'

CREATE TABLE `pts_fish_list` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `fish_file_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '鱼眼图文件名',
  `machine_no` varchar(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备序列号',
  `admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '下载人ID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_machine_no` (`machine_no`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='鱼眼图文件流水表'

CREATE TABLE `pts_list_log` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `parent_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '父ID',
  `file_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件名',
  `machine_no` varchar(18) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备序列号',
  `admin_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '下载人ID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_machine_no` (`machine_no`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='PTS上传日志表'

CREATE TABLE `vr_activity` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '活动名称',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活动类型，0表示普通活动，1表示投票活动',
  `counter` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '计数器值',
  `begin_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '活动开始时间',
  `end_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' COMMENT '活动结束时间',
  `config` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '其它配置字段(JSON格式)',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活动状态，0表示不活跃，1表示活跃',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr_activity'

CREATE TABLE `work_route` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线名称',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr id',
  `route_point_list` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线点位列表',
  `indicator_point_list` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '指示牌点位列表',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR中的点位路线'

CREATE TABLE `album_project_relation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `album_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '相册id',
  `project_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '相册关联的项目，project表主键id',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_album_id` (`album_id`),
  KEY `idx_project_id` (`project_id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='相册关联项目表'

CREATE TABLE `basic_shepherd_data` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `cache_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '算子若是命中缓存, 记录命中的缓存ID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `project_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '项目ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `db_version` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '数据版本',
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `task_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'VR处理的任务ID',
  `shepherd_task_type` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '牧羊人的任务类型',
  `shepherd_task_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '牧羊人任务ID',
  `shepherd_operator_id` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '牧羊人算子ID',
  `cache_type` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '缓存类型: intermediate - 中间产物 final - 最终产物',
  `business_callback_id` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务的回调ID',
  `version` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '编辑数据版本',
  `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0默认,1处理中,2处理失败,3处理成功',
  `file_path` varchar(256) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产物文件存储路径',
  `file_url` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产物文件临时下载地址',
  `extension` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}' COMMENT '扩展信息',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom` (`custom_id`),
  KEY `idx_task` (`task_id`),
  KEY `idx_shepherd_operator` (`shepherd_operator_id`),
  KEY `idx_work` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_version` (`version`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=175 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='编辑三元组产物'

CREATE TABLE `custom_content` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `display_platform` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '使用方平台',
  `data_key` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文案的标识',
  `data_content` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文案的内容',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_display_platform_data_key` (`display_platform`,`data_key`) USING BTREE COMMENT '适用方平台和文案标识'
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `live_room` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `user_type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户类型',
  `user_platform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '用户平台',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Work ID',
  `relation_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Relation ID',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `extension` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uniq_user_id_type_platform_relation_id` (`user_id`,`user_type`,`user_platform`,`relation_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr live room'

CREATE TABLE `work_house_relation` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WorkID',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `city_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '城市ID',
  `source` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '业务方来源标识',
  `house_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房屋编号',
  `house_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '房源编号',
  `house_type` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '房屋委托类型',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '关联类型(0: 默认类型,1: 订单类型)',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段(JSON格式)',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  `create_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间戳',
  `modify_timestamp` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '更新时间戳',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_house_id_house_code_source` (`house_id`,`house_code`,`source`),
  KEY `idx_source_city_id` (`source`,`city_id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`),
  KEY `idx_source_house_code` (`source`,`house_code`),
  KEY `idx_source_house_id` (`source`,`house_id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=210 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='work_house_relation'

CREATE TABLE `work_flat_map_matrix` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `flat_map_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '平面图片id',
  `work_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'vr id',
  `transfer_matrix` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '转换矩阵',
  `remark` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_work_id` (`work_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='VR平面图片转换矩阵'

CREATE TABLE `activity_item` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `activity_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '活动ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '报名用户ID',
  `target_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '参与活动的对象ID',
  `view` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '浏览量',
  `mark` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标记值，可用于标记活动结果',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '活动状态，0表示退出活动，1表示参与活动',
  `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0用户报名项目；1手动构造的图片项目；2手动构造的视频项目；3手动构造的vr项目；4手动构造的裸vr项目',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '参与活动的信息（JSON格式）',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_target` (`activity_id`,`target_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='activity_item'

CREATE TABLE `custom_filter` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '订制项目id',
  `style` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '滤镜风格',
  `backdrop` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '滤镜参数json',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='custom_filter'

CREATE TABLE `custom_route` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
  `custom_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制id',
  `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线名称',
  `display_index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '路线前端展示顺序',
  `pano_group` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线点位列表(JSON: int array)',
  `path` text COMMENT '路径（新版路线引导-自定义路线路径数据）',
  `panorama_style_config` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线在全景态展示配置',
  `model_style_config` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线在模型态展示配置',
  `type` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线类型:custom-自定义路线；observer：点位路线',
  `visible_floor_indexes` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '路线所在楼层数组',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_custom_id` (`custom_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=22 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='路线引导'

CREATE TABLE `live_group_user` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增ID',
  `room_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'roomID',
  `session_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'sessionID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户ID',
  `user_type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户类型（1:用户，2:经纪人，3:置业顾问）',
  `user_platform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户平台',
  `user_role` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户角色',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户状态',
  `extension` varchar(2048) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '扩展字段',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_room_id` (`room_id`),
  KEY `idx_session_id` (`session_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='vr live group user'

CREATE TABLE `user_logout` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `phone` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '电话',
  `create_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  `modify_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-02 00:00:00' ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '修改时间',
  `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '注销流程是否完成 0未完成 1已完成',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='user_logout'
